EmailTemplate.description: Change Password email for all the community users
EmailTemplate.name: Partner Community Changed Password Email
EmailTemplate.subject: {!$Label.DPT_IPP_Value_Chain_Platform_Forgot_Password_Email_01} {!Community_Name}{!$Label.DPT_IPP_Value_Chain_Platform_Forgot_Password_Email_02}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Receiving_User.FirstName},
Your password has been reset for {!Community_Name}. Go to:
{!Community_Url}
Thank You, DuPont Protection Technologies Team
